hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Deku Stick#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #northern basement of the Water Temple# contains...^ #the Water Temple Boss Key# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Water Temple GS Near Boss Key Chest

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that lifting a #rock in the desert# reveals a #generic grotto#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Deku Stick#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Graveyard# is a foolish choice.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Hammer Room Clear Chest

GC (Maze).text: They say that shooting #the sun# grants #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #a Recovery Heart# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals a small #Fairy Fountain#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Crater## has #1# major item.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Strength Upgrade#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Purple Rupee# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that ##Kakariko Village## has #1# major item.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #Ruto's Letter#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Lobby Right Chest

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that plundering #inside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the path of time.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Front Center Bombable Chest

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #the Boomerang#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Side Room Near Dodongos

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #20 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #final treasure of Ice Cavern# is #a Deku Stick#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Strength Upgrade#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ToT (Left).text: Did you know that you only need to play the Song of Time to open the Door of Time? The Spiritual Stones are not needed.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #a Green Potion Bottle# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #the Stone of Agony#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Hallway Left Invisible Chest

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that plundering #the Market# is a foolish choice.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the path to #the Key#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that the #Gerudo Horseback Archery# rewards...^ #Bombs (20 pieces)# and #the Requiem of Spirit#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that ##the Lost Woods## has #6# major items.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Dead Hand in the well# guards...^ #the Shadow Temple Boss Key# and #an Ice Cavern Compass#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Lens of Truth Chest
